Articles.Content:
As you all know, 1.0 will be released on Monday, the 27th April 2015. This game has grown into a fantastic display of mechanics and creation that couldn't have been done without the Developers. 

So, without further ado, please raise your glass and give a Toast to the following:

**To Harvester**

**To C7**

**To Maxmaps**

**To Ted**

**To Romfarer**

**To Rogelio**

**To Mu**

**To Samssonart**

**To danRosas**

**To Novasilsko**

**To KasperVId**

**To Porkjet**

**To Roverdude**

**To Arsonside**

**To Rowsdower**

**To bac9**

**To ClairieLyrae**

**To Hugo**

**And to the Moderators, modders and creators that weren't named, thank you.** 

Not only have I learnt about orbital mechanics and game development over the past 4 years, but I've witnessed the growth of a family of passionate people who dream of piercing the atmosphere with canisters of LF/O and little green men (and soon to be women )

**\*Raises Glass\***

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-22T06:31:17Z" title="04/22/2015 06:31  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 22, 2015</time> by One-Way Films**
\*Raises glass filled with rocket fuel and an engine at the bottom which takes off in a fiery glory\*
I never need an excuse to drink heavily.

\*Raises glass\*

Thank you so much SQUAD, and all you people associated with it! KSP will always be my favorite game!!

All the best with 1.0, and I sincerely thank you for creating this masterpiece which is KSP!

\*raises booster\*

Wait, what am I doing? We all know where this game started. Let's use the customary term.

*Hail Probe! Congratulations, SQUAD!*

My guess was one day off. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Cheers Squad!

EDIT: And three days after my birthday, to boot. Thanks for the present! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

![tumblr_moo4np1zdR1qfeafco6_r1_500.gif](https://31.media.tumblr.com/e333dab38f9915060d25faa52e35d1f1/tumblr_moo4np1zdR1qfeafco6_r1_500.gif)

I hope I don't get in trouble for copyright infringement!
**\*Raises Glass\*** you all deserve the highest of praises

**\*Raises potato\***

Cheers for the great game Squad!

\*raises glass\*

\*liquid leaves the glass and coalesces in the form of a near-perfect undulating sphere before splatting into a very important looking instrument panel\*

\*panel fizzles and cracks out loud sparks, the cabin goes dark\*

![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> \*raises glass\*
> \*liquid leaves the glass and coalesces in the form of a near-perfect undulating sphere before splatting into a very important looking instrument panel\*
> 
> \*panel fizzles and cracks out loud sparks, the cabin goes dark\*
> 
> ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

[Communotron 16]: Uploading Data...100%

[Research and Development] 23 data received on *Glass Explosion from Kerbin's Forums.* +100.0 science added.

[Communotron 16]: Done!

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-21T23:19:15Z" title="04/21/2015 11:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 21, 2015</time> by moogoob**
  
colour

You've forgot about ClairaLyrae - wherever she is. We hope you are OK, Claira ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Your parts still live in the game.

> 
> You've forgot about ClairaLyrae - wherever she is. We hope you are OK, Claira ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Your parts still live in the game.

Also forgot the guy that built the KSC... bac9.
Cheers from me. I'll buy any of you a drink if you're in Denver. Or whatever is your intoxicant of choice ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Also forgot the guy that built the KSC... bac9.

And Hugo. He did some stuff too.
Don't forget Rowsdower--hearding Kerbal Kats is no mean feat.
\*starts construction of a large SSTO glass

\***Raises can of hydrazine**\*

Yes indeed.

\***Raises glass** (of the Mk3 shuttle cockpit)\*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-22T00:01:25Z" title="04/22/2015 12:01  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 22, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**
-raises glass- Cheers! =^.^=

> 
> without further a due

without further *ado*

I know I'm reusing this from my 0.90 post but here we go

I'd Like to raise a glass

[![2014-12-19_00001.jpg](http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w424/wolfedg/2014-12-19_00001.jpg)](http://s1075.photobucket.com/user/wolfedg/media/2014-12-19_00001.jpg.html)

And say

To the Mun!

[![2014-12-19_00005.jpg](http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w424/wolfedg/2014-12-19_00005.jpg)](http://s1075.photobucket.com/user/wolfedg/media/2014-12-19_00005.jpg.html)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-22T00:20:18Z" title="04/22/2015 12:20  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 22, 2015</time> by wolfedg**
\*Raises glass\* One day KSP will have overcome all other games! one day... KSP will have sold more than Minecraft, SpaceEngineers, and any other game combined! Thanks devs.
\*Raises soda can\*

\*Raises a keg full of meed (and another full of vodka)\*

To Squad!

\*Raises mug full of root beer\*

Cheers to anything having to do with KSP!
